name: Dimensions Climber
description:
switch dimensions to know where to jump and where enemies are.

 Climb your way to the TOP!

note:

if the platfrom appears in both dimensions that means it's safe to jump on

And If there is only one way to climb the platforms you climb on are safe 

everything in the game is entirely made in the jam period, 

with no external assets being used.

thanks for playing<3
